name: The Sister I Never Had - 3
description:
The movies that we get to see
The books that we get to read
You’re the sister I never had
Those happy moments turned into devastation
Those fairytales came with wicked endings
You’re the sister I never had
You slowly became weaker and weaker
Your warm and delicate façade became colder
You’re the sister I never had
I tried to catch your tears with the palm of my hand
With each session you became paler with your hair slightly falling
It breaks my heart to watch the sister I never had.

by Jovierose
